column1: # C-GEM Seasonal Calibration Targets: Mekong Delta
# 4-STAGE CALIBRATION TARGETS from March 2025 Field Campaign
# IMPORTANT: Time_Day is days AFTER WARMUP (post-warmup simulation day)
#   - Time_Day = 15 means compare at day 15 of the "real" simulation
#   - This is independent of warmup period setting in case_config.txt
#   - March 2025 data corresponds to dry season (~Day 15 after warmup)
# STAGE 1: SALINITY PROFILES (Day 15 post-warmup = dry season)
# Target: 60-80 km intrusion in dry season (4 PSU isohaline)
# ETM typically at 20-40 km from mouth
